steps.title: Cost Planner
steps.subtitle:
Understand the true cost of care and plan for long-term affordability.

**We'll help you:**
• Get a quick cost estimate based on your care recommendation
• Explore different care options and their monthly costs
• See how health and safety factors affect pricing
• Move into detailed financial planning when you're ready

steps.title: Plan for Your Care Recommendation
steps.subtitle: Review your recommendation and select a care type to see estimated costs.

steps.title: Sign In for Full Assessment
steps.subtitle:
To access detailed financial planning tools, we need you to create a free account or sign in.

**What's included in the Full Assessment:**
• Income from all sources (Social Security, pensions, investments)
• Asset evaluation (savings, home equity, investments)
• Specialized benefit eligibility (VA, Medicaid, insurance)
• Personalized affordability timeline and recommendations
